alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Newberry, northwestern Lexington and eastern Saluda Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 200 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saluda, or 11 miles northwest of Batesburg-Leesville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saluda, Dreher Island State Park, Cedar Grove Fire Station, South Shore Marina, Oswald Park, Saluda Co Sheriff`s Office, Shull Island, Fairview Fire Station, Siesta Cove Marina, Rocky Point Recreation Area, Wyses Ferry, Hollywood Elementary School, Emory, Lake Murray Shores, Circle Fire Station, Delmar, Hollow Creek Public Park, Riverbend Boat Ramp, and Saluda High School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
